com.unimelb.swen30006.mailroom

Class DeliveryBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unimelb.swen30006.mailroom.DeliveryBot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stepable

    public class DeliveryBot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Stepable
    A Simple Delivery bot, that picks a box using a Selection Strategy and then delivers that box to all floors. It will report back its statistics for time taken to deliver boxes after all deliveries are made.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DeliveryBot.DeliveryStatistic 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeliveryBot(SelectionStrategy selectionStrategy, DeliveryStrategy deliveryStrategy, MailStorage storage, int mailRoomFloor)
      Create a delivery bot with a chosen strategy for delivery and selection, along with the mail storage repo to pick mail up from and the floor that this mail room is on.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      boolean canFinish()
      Checks whether or not this unit is in a state where it concludes the simulation is finished given there is no further information to come.
      DeliveryBot.DeliveryStatistic[] retrieveStatistics()
      Package the statistics list into an array for computation of delivery performance by other systems

      Perform a single time step action for this object

    • Constructor Detail

      • DeliveryBot

        public DeliveryBot(SelectionStrategy selectionStrategy,
           DeliveryStrategy deliveryStrategy,
           MailStorage storage,
           int mailRoomFloor)
        Create a delivery bot with a chosen strategy for delivery and selection, along with the mail storage repo to pick mail up from and the floor that this mail room is on.
        Parameters:
        selectionStrategy - the strategy for selecting storage boxes to deliver
        deliveryStrategy - the strategy for selecting which floor to deliver to next
        storage - the mail storage unit
        mailRoomFloor - the floor the mail room is located on

        public DeliveryBot.DeliveryStatistic[] retrieveStatistics()
